name: Don't Keep The Devil Waiting
description:
Left for Dead by an Outlaw and in his last moments alive, a Sheriff makes a Deal With The Devil to get his Vengeance.

He must pass Judgement upon Six of the Outlaw’s Lieutenants, whose souls are wanted by the Devil. To do so, the Sheriff is given The Devil’s Gun, a Six Shot Revolver capable of Punishing its Victim’s Soul.

He is given 7 Days to perform the task, having another chance at life should he succeed or eternally serving the Devil otherwise.

Controls: 

Movemente: AWSD;

Mouse - Select tile of attack and pick action;

Space: enter attack mode;

Switch weapon: 

       1- Revolver;

       2- Rifle;

       3- Knife;

Group of 4: 

    Fábio França: Programmer, Game Designer, Project Manager and Creative Director;

    Lucas Kenji: Lead programmer;

    Ricardo Oliveira: Level Designer, Artist and Game Writer;

    Luana Baía: Lead Artist;
